Posts.Content: Jan 10, 2011 03:50AM AdaTurner wrote: There's a new innovative way to detect cancer cells: An experimental cancer blood test. The new cancer blood examination might make earlier detection of cancer easier. During cancer treatment, the blood test could help doctors chart probably the most effective course and provide more accurate proof of success.I think this is a very good news for everyone. It's about time to get involved in cancer prevention these days.
